// Pivot 0, 0
int backgroundtest[12] = {
	311, 281,
	274, 303,
	276, 306,
	315, 300,
	322, 295,
	321, 285
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float backgroundtest[12] = {
	0.809896f, 0.465232f,
	0.713542f, 0.501656f,
	0.718750f, 0.506622f,
	0.820313f, 0.496689f,
